availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Cynthia Jones. Father of Laura A. Jones. Owned one enslaved person in Henry County in 1850. Member of the Henry County Masonic Lodge 249.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District 1, p. 579.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Subdivision 2, p. 7.
Proceedings of the Grand Lodge of Kentucky, at a Grand Annual Communication Held in the City of Louisville, Commencing the 19th day of October, A.D. 1876, A.L. 5876 , (Frankfort: James A. Hodges, 1877), 185.
